verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%>. Many a time <S%H7227><s%> have they afflicted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%>, may Israel <S%H3478><s%> now say <S%H559><s%>: Many: or, Much
Many a time <S%H7227><s%> have they afflicted <S%H6887><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%>: yet they have not prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against me. Many: or, Much
The plowers <S%H2790><s%> plowed <S%H2790><s%> upon my back <S%H1354><s%>: they made long <S%H748><s%> their furrows <S%H4618><s%> <S%H4618><s%>.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%>: he hath cut asunder <S%H7112><s%> the cords <S%H5688><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.
Let them all be confounded <S%H954><s%> and turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> that hate <S%H8130><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
Let them be as the grass <S%H2682><s%> upon the housetops <S%H1406><s%>, which withereth <S%H3001><s%> afore <S%H6927><s%> it groweth up <S%H8025><s%>:
Wherewith the mower <S%H7114><s%> filleth <S%H4390><s%> not his hand <S%H3709><s%>; nor he that bindeth sheaves <S%H6014><s%> his bosom <S%H2683><s%>.

Neither do they which go by <S%H5674><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, The blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be upon you: we bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
